description: ProjectInfo represents detailed information about a project that a group is a member of

^(latest_version_id)$.description: The latest version ID of the project, if available

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the project was created

latestVersionId.description: The latest version ID of the project, if available

role.description: Role of the group in the project (admin or viewer)

title: Project Info
